questions.question: Which artery supplies the primary motor cortex?
questions.explanation: The middle cerebral artery supplies the lateral surface of the cerebral hemisphere including the primary motor cortex in the precentral gyrus.

questions.question: Which spinal tract carries pain and temperature sensation?
questions.explanation: The lateral spinothalamic tract carries pain and temperature sensation from the contralateral side of the body.
